com.oceanoptics.omnidriver.features.version

Interface Version


  • public interface Version
    This interface provides a centralized way of obtaining a device's firmware version.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • isAdvancedVersion

        boolean isAdvancedVersion()
        Predicate denoting whether or not this is an instance of AdvancedVersion.
        Returns:
        true if this is an instance of AdvancedVersion; false otherwise.

      • getFirmwareVersion

        java.lang.String getFirmwareVersion()
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the FX2 firmware version as a string.
        Returns:
        the FX2 firmware version as a string (e.g. " HR2000+ 3.30.0")
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if communication to the spectrometer failed.
